definition: abbr. for 春節聯歡晚會|春节联欢晚会[Chun1 jie2 Lian2 huan1 Wan3 hui4]

sentences.english: A. Which program impresses you the most during the Spring Festival Evening Gala last night?
sentences.chinese: 昨天春晚的哪個節目你印象最深刻？

sentences.english: It's become a Chinese custom for many familes to watch the CCTV New Year Gala while having their dinner.
sentences.chinese: 喫年夜飯看春晚已經成爲很多中國家庭的習俗。

sentences.english: It seems that it has become a tradition for us to watch Spring Festival Gala on the Chinese New Year's eve.
sentences.chinese: 似乎已經成爲了一個傳統，大年三十守着春晚過年夜。

sentences.english: Frankly speaking, I would definitely not support super star are lip-synching in Spring Festival Gala.
sentences.chinese: 說實在的，我確實反對明星在春晚的舞臺上“假唱”。

sentences.english: It has also been the subject of much debate.
sentences.chinese: 可春晚也受到越來越多的爭議。

sentences.english: Please don't jam progammes into advertisements.
sentences.chinese: 請不要在廣告中插播春晚。

sentences.english: That is not too bad a new year resolution.
sentences.chinese: 看春晚，毋寧死，也許這是個不錯的新年新立志。

sentences.english: The preparation of the grass root gala has experienced a lot of challenges since its inception.
sentences.chinese: 草根春晚從籌辦開始就經歷了一系列的挑戰。

sentences.english: The Spring Festival Gala used to give us the sense of "chicken ribs" --- tasteless when eaten but a pity to throw away.
sentences.chinese: 以前對春晚的感覺就是雞肋，食之無味，棄之可惜。

sentences.english: Which is your favorite program in the Spring Festival Gala?
sentences.chinese: 七嘴八舌話春晚，你最喜歡的春晚節目是什麼？

sentences.english: Which is your favorite program in the Spring Festival Gala?
sentences.chinese: 七嘴八舌話春晚，你最喜歡的春晚節目是什麼？

sentences.english: EVERYONE knows that the CCTV Spring Festival Gala has long dominated Chinese New Year`s Eve.
sentences.chinese: 衆所周知，央視春晚是每年除夕夜的重頭節目。

sentences.english: And the gala is now a special dish in the table already.
sentences.chinese: “春晚”已經成爲家家戶戶餐桌上的一道特殊的菜餚。

sentences.english: Now she's comfirming with a performance at this year's CCTV Gala.
sentences.chinese: 如今，她被證實將亮相今年的央視春晚。

sentences.english: It is learned that the 2014 CCTV Spring Festival Gala may remain "Zero Advertising".
sentences.chinese: 據說今年春晚將仍保持零廣告插播形式。

sentences.english: However, the Spring Festival Gala of this year was creative, bringing forth some new ideas.
sentences.chinese: 今年的春晚倒是一掃陳腐之氣，搞搞新意思。

definition: CCTV New Year's Gala, Chinese New Year special/abbr. to 春晚[Chun1 Wan3]
pinyin: Chun1 jie2 Lian2 huan1 Wan3 hui4

definition: short, simple literary or artistic creation/essay/skit
China Central Television (CCTV), abbr. for 中國中央電視台|中国中央电视台[Zhong1 guo2 Zhong1 yang1 Dian4 shi4 tai2]
Zhao Benshan (1958-), universally known PRC TV comedian
satellite TV (abbr. for 衛星電視|卫星电视[wei4 xing1 dian4 shi4])
Li Yuchun aka Chris Lee (1984-), Chinese pop singer
